text: Mukama omulabirizi we yamwanukula olwanukula olwa namaddala era naamukuza enkuza ennungi era naamukwasa Zakaria abe omukuza, buli Zakaria lweyayingiranga mu kifo Mariam weyatuulanga olwokusinza ngâ€™amusanga alina ebyokulya. Naagamba nti owange Mariam bino obifuna kuva wa, naamuddamu nti byo biva wa Katonda, mazima Katonda agabirira oyo gwayagadde awatali kubalirira
